## Data Frame

* tabular data
* every element in col same, rows can be diff
* matrices all have to be same, df not

```{r}
my_df <- data.frame(foo=1:4, bar=c(T,T,F,F))
my_df
```

* Rename columns
```{r}
names(my_df) <- c('col1','col2')
my_df
```
